name: .PXPATTERN File Extension
summary: Learn about .PXPATTERN files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open PXPATTERN files with the Pro version of Furnace Creek Software Pixen in macOS. To open a PXPATTERN file, select Patterns, click the plus (+) icon in the lower-right, and select Import Pattern from 1-bit Image.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
